content: Determine exactly one command to use, and respond using the format specified above:

Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: providing an overview of artificial intelligence, including its definition, history, sub-fields, and types. It also discusses philosophical and ethical considerations related to AI and its applications, but does not provide a direct answer to the question of what the different types of AI are.

Links: ['Jump to content (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Artificial_intelligence#bodyContent)', 'Main page (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Main_Page)', 'Contents (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wikipedia:Contents)', 'Current events (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Portal:Current_events)', 'Random article (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Special:Random)']
Determine exactly one command to use, and respond using the format specified above:

Command get_text_summary returned:  "Result" : a collection of various sources and articles covering the history, development, subfields, applications, risks, and ethical implications of artificial intelligence (AI), as well as related fields such as cybernetics and emerging technologies. It provides a broad overview of the current state and future potential of AI, including discussions on machine learning, neural networks, robotics, and the impact of AI on society and employment.
